summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED.   *AK   THE CONSUMER HAD COME TO AN INTERSECTION, HAD HER FOOT ON THE BRAKE, SUDDENLY THE STEERING LOCKED, AIMED THE VEHICLE TO THE RIGHT, WENT OFF THE ROAD, OVER THE CURB AND ALMOST REAR ENDED BY A TRACTOR TRAILER.  THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE WAS STILL IN THE DRIVING LANE.  THE CONSUMER WAS ON THE WAY TO THE DEALER TO HAVE THE BRAKES CHECKED OUT ALONG WITH THE REMOTE STARTER WHICH ALLOWED THE VEHICLE TO BE DRIVEN WITHOUT KEYS.  THE VEHICLE WAS RETURNED TO THE DEALER  FOR A BRAKE DEFECT.   *SCC  *JB
